chess.quote.draw.1: ğŸ¤ "In chess, as in life, a man is his own most dangerous opponent." - Reuben Fine
chess.quote.draw.10: â³ "I don't believe in psychology. I believe in good moves." - Bobby Fischer
chess.quote.draw.2: âš–ï¸ "The hardest game to win is a won game." - Emanuel Lasker
chess.quote.draw.3: ğŸ­ "There are two types of sacrifices: correct ones, and mine." - Mikhail Tal
chess.quote.draw.4: ğŸŒŠ "Chess is a sea in which a gnat may drink and an elephant may bathe." - Indian Proverb
chess.quote.draw.6: ğŸ¯ "Half the variations which are calculated in a tournament game turn out to be completely superfluous." - Jan Timman
chess.quote.draw.7: ğŸ’« "A strong memory, concentration, imagination, and a strong will is required to become a great chess player." - Fischer
chess.quote.draw.9: ğŸ¨ "Chess is the art of analysis." - Mikhail Botvinnik
chess.quote.loss.1: ğŸ’ª "Losing can persuade you to change what doesn't need to be changed, and winning can convince you everything is fine even if you are on the brink of disaster." - Garry Kasparov
chess.quote.loss.10: âš¡ "You may learn much more from a game you lose than from a game you win." - Capablanca
chess.quote.loss.2: ğŸŒ± "You must take your opponent into a deep dark forest where 2+2=5, and the path leading out is only wide enough for one." - Mikhail Tal
chess.quote.loss.3: ğŸ”„ "Life is like a game of chess. To win you have to make a move." - Allan Rufus
chess.quote.loss.4: ğŸ“š "I have not given any drawn or lost games, because I thought them inadequate for the purposes of instruction." - Capablanca
chess.quote.loss.5: ğŸ² "The blunders are all there on the board, waiting to be made." - Savielly Tartakower
chess.quote.loss.6: ğŸŒŸ "The mistakes are there, waiting to be made." - Savielly Tartakower
chess.quote.loss.7: ğŸ›¡ï¸ "I prefer to lose a really good game than to win a bad one." - David Levy
chess.quote.loss.8: ğŸŒ¸ "Even a poor plan is better than no plan." - Frank Marshall
chess.quote.loss.9: ğŸ“ "Every chess master was once a beginner who refused to give up." - Unknown

chess.quote.win.1: ğŸ‘‘ "Every chess master was once a beginner." - Chernev
chess.quote.win.10: ğŸª "Chess is the struggle against error." - Johannes Zukertort
chess.quote.win.2: âš”ï¸ "Tactics is knowing what to do when there is something to do; strategy is knowing what to do when there is nothing to do." - Tartakower
chess.quote.win.3: ğŸ† "The beauty of a move lies not in its appearance but in the thought behind it." - Nimzowitsch
chess.quote.win.4: ğŸ¯ "The winner of the game is the player who makes the next-to-last mistake." - Tartakower
chess.quote.win.5: â™Ÿï¸ "Even a poor plan is better than no plan at all." - Mikhail Chigorin
chess.quote.win.6: ğŸ”¥ "The threat is stronger than the execution." - Nimzowitsch
chess.quote.win.7: ğŸ’ "Discovered check is the dive bomber of the chessboard." - Reuben Fine
